climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX MADE IN GREEN products are tested for harmful substances and made in safer workplaces with reduced environmental impacts. OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【5S Slow Rebound Memory Foam Pillow】 The neck pillow shapes automatically when firmly being pressed and will rebound within 5S when no press, non-deformation all the year. Lying on the bed pillow feels like floating on water or clouds, no pressure on the skin. With slow rebound design, the neck support pillow does NOT compress auricle like other common pillows.

【Removable Pillowcase & Breathable Pillow】 The pillow for sleeping comes with removable pillowcase, which is made of soft comfortable fabric and mesh sides, removable and machine-washed, making you stay cooling feel all night. Besides, the orthopedic pillow features excellent moisture absorption performance and breathability, remaining consistent firmness and comfortable feel all the year.

【2 Adjustable Heights for Any Sleep Style】 The foam pillow is with size: 23.6 x 14 x 4.9/3.4 inches ( L x W x H). There are two available neck support heights to support your neck and head. The ergonomic and supportive pillow for neck pain is designed for multiple sleeping positions, such as side sleeping, supine, stomach sleeping, back sleeping and low pillow sleepers etc.

【Pillow to Relieve Neck Pain】 The contour pillow fits automatically according to the body curve to relieve and release your muscles and physical and mental pressure. With the personalized customized shape, the cervical pillow fits the contours of your head, neck and shoulders as well, which greatly relieves pain and reduces shoulder pressure to achieve a healthy sleep, waking up in the morning without pain.

【Great Gift Choice for People】 Ylekto pillow effectively prevents cervical vertebrae problems and helps reduce sleepless nights. Perfect gift choice for elderly, office workers, students and all ages people. If for any reason you're not satisfied with the neck pillow, please feel free to contact us. We offers 24-month product worry-free and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Memory Foam Pillow helps relieve neck pain, shoulder pain, headache and insomnia!

Cooling & Breathable Pillow The neck pillow comes with ice silk pillowcase, which is made of soft comfortable ice silk fabric and mesh sides, removable and machine-washed. making you stay cooling feel all night. Machine Washable Pillowcase Available in two heights, the ergonomic memory foam pillow conforms to the contours of your head, neck and shoulders to relieve pain and achieve a healthy deep sleep. 5S Slow Rebound Memory Foam The pillow will shape automatically when firmly being pressed and rebound within 5S when no press, non-deformation all the year. Perfect firmness, ideal balance between soft and support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and Comfort
reviews.reviewText: The pillow provides strong neck support, relieving cervical pain. Its ergonomic design and washable cover make it a comfortable and practical choice for enhancing sleep quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pain relieving neck pillow ever!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow fits my neck so perfectly, I can get comfortable enough to sleep without pain. It does not flatten & pops right back up! I sleep on back & both sides & it feels so good! No more neck pain! Pillow, where have been all my life?Been tempted to order a Sutera, but afraid I would be disappointed, & their price is so outrageous!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big hump is too big for me. Otherwise wonderful pillow for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this pillow for sleeping every night for the last week. It is the perfect amount of firm for me, and I love that it is never lumpy or out of shape since it is solid memory foam rather than stuffing. I have been sleeping quite well on it, though it took me about a week to get used to. My only complaint is that the bigger of the two humps is just a little too big to very be comfortable for me. When I sleep on my back it puts too much pressure on my neck, and when I sleep on my side it lifts my head just a little too high. So, I almost always use the smaller side. I might get used to the bigger one more over time though; I still usually try it once or twice a night. All that to say, it's not perfect, but it is truly amazing for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Pillow for Sleep
reviews.reviewText: Compared to the numerous pillows , I finally found the perfect pillow for me. Its supportive and comfortablefor my head and neck. I am able to sleep much better using this type of pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this pillow, I’d been looking for a contour foam one like this to replace my old one. It’s the perfect blend of soft and firm, a few of these I’ve tried are way too dense and become hard as a rock in cold weather. Not this one, stays soft enough for me. The cover it comes with seems well made, just a nice product overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Queen size in not queen size
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this pillow in the queen size and it was actually smaller than a standard size pillow I have. The pillow case was too big for it even. The support was good, but it just wasn't for me. I prefer a larger pillow. It felt too small and was hard for me to get it situated comfortably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your neck will thank you
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommended for people that have neck pain because of bad posture while sleeping. Super comfortable, cool and you can feel the support on your neck and shoulders. I bought the full size but feel like it’s too small for me, I’m going to buy again but the queen size pillow (more normal size)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is great! It’s not quite as firm as I was expecting but it’s sooo comfortable. Forms around your head and neck. Slept great with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had to 'boost' it with another pillow under it, but so far, I have found it to be very comfortable and cool. Hopefully my neck will not ache so much now.
It's a good thing. Well shaped. Helps me with my sleep related neck pain.

Recommended by a friend as I am experiencing neck pain while sleeping on regular pillows. I have been using the pillow for a week and already feel the difference. It is an excellent product and highly recommend getting if anyone has neck trouble while sleeping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 13, 2023

reviews.reviewText: This is too soft and doesn’t offer much support.
